summary: An ordinance abandoning the City's interest in sewer easements over portions of Lots 4, 5 and 6, Block 9, Minnie L. Kraus' Subdivision of Blocks One (1), and Nine (9), and portions of Blocks Two (2), Eight (8), Ten (10), Seventeen (17), and Eighteen (18), Plat of Lake Side City Addition, and of vacated East 113th Street.
